delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockTruck, OrdinaryTruck, RefrigeratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    Truck is the abstract class that provides the framework for both OrdinaryTruck and RefrigeratedTruck. A Truck has and can return its capacity and stock. Trucks are used by Manifest to reorder the stock needed by the store.
    Author:
    Alex Koppon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Truck()
      Constructs a Truck object.
      Truck(int capacity)
      Constructs a Truck with just capacity.
      Truck(int capacity, Stock stock)
      Construct a Truck with both a Stock and a capacity
      Truck(Stock stock)
      Construct a Truck with a Stock.

             Stock stock)

        stock -
        Throws:

      throws DeliveryException

      • addStock

        public abstract void addStock(Stock stock)
                       throws DeliveryException
        Abstract method. addStock(Stock stock) should add the stock from the stock object passed into the function to the stock currently in the truck
        Parameters:
        stock -
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if cold stock is added to an OrdinaryTruck

      • getCost

        public abstract double getCost()
        Abstract method.
        Returns:
        the double cost. The calculation for this is different for different truck types

      • getType

        public abstract java.lang.String getType()
        Abstract method.
        Returns:
        the String of the truck's type

      • getRemainingCapacity

        public abstract int getRemainingCapacity()
        Abstract method.
        Returns:
        the remaining capacity in a truck i.e(capacity-totalStockQuantity)

      • getManifest

        public abstract java.lang.String getManifest()
                                      throws StockException
        Abstract method.
        Returns:
        the a string of the stock contained in a truck in the format used by Manifest. This takes the form >type\nitem,quantity\nitem,quantity\n.."
        Throws:
        StockException
